This is a demo
```mermaid
journey
    title our road trip
    section prepare
      fill up car: 2: Me
      pack food: 3: my plus one
      plan journey: 5: my plus one, Me
    section get on road
      drive: 3: Me
      Sit down: 5: my plus one
```
